description: enough information about each assignment to create an overview and generate code-review/report links

name.description: what the assignment is called.  if there is a repo for this project, the name should be exactly the expected repo name

live.description: (defaults to true). whether or not to expect a live site accompanying this assignment. if the value is true, a link to github pages will be auto-generated.  if the value is a string that string will be treated as the url for the live project.  Strings will have all instances of '<user-name>' replaced with the student's github user name, and all instances of `<assignment-name>` will be replaced with the name from this assignment entry

reports.description: a list of any and all report files a student is expected to build and push for this assignment.  will be read using github pages

items.description: relative paths to report files from the top of the repo. should indicate file & extension

repo.description: optional.  will be used to generate links to the repository if you want to name the project something different than the repo name
